findings.title: Smart contract owner can donate and withdraw from vault
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to donate and withdraw from the vault, which may pose a security risk.

findings.title: Smart contract does not utilize re-entrancy guard to prevent re-entrant calls
findings.description: Functions like beginStaking() and endStaking() should be protected against re-entrancy.

findings.title: Smart contract owner can edit pool terms
findings.description: The smart contract owner has the ability to edit pool terms, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Low severity issue: Use of block.timestamp
findings.description: The contract uses block.timestamp which can be manipulated by miners.
